vocabInfos.mediumDef:
People descended from Arak(?) of the Canaanites, first mentioned at Gen.10.17; descended from Canaan (H3667); along with Sidon (H6721), Heth (H2845), Jebusite (H2983), Amorite (H0567), Girgashite (H1622), Hivite (H2340), Sinite (H5513), Arvadite (H0721), Zemarite (H6786) and Hamathite (H2577)
§ Arkite = see Arki "gnawing"
an inhabitant of Arki or Arka
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞基人 这个專有種族名稱 形容詞在原文的意思是 參見亞基 "咬囓"
亞基地的居民 {#創 10:17|}
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚基人 这个专有种族名称 形容词在原文的意思是 参见亚基 "咬囓"
亚基地的居民 {#创 10:17|}
